short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get reminded to fight Trump's agenda when you're being least productive. Push pause on your social media to take actions online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We at 100DaysOfTrump.org believe every action matters when it comes to standing up for inclusion, compassion, love for other people and for the planet.

This is why #60SecondResistance reminds you to fight Trump's divisive agenda when you're being least productive. Our Chrome extension will help you pause your social media browsing after a few minutes to show you actions you can take online to fight Trump, based on your issues of interest. 

Select how often you want to take action, which issues matter to you, and this extension will show you the latest and most popular petitions and letters you can sign quickly online to keep yourself involved in the national discourse.

Built by the 100DaysOfTrump.org team.
